column4: Anybody know why my screen might keep flickering? Occasionally, perhaps every 5 minutes, my monitor flickers black for just a half-second, and then it's fine again
That sounds scary.  I lost a monitor one time after it started acting up a little.  The problem was the video card went bad and it started sending signals to the monitor that were screwing it up.
i doubt it, anything's possible but this monitor's not that old, and has been very solid

Yeah, but if the video card is mistreating the monitor...  My video card was less than  a year old when it started doing that to the monitor.  I'm just saying you need to figure that flickering out.  Could be bad.
